name: totemic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
respected by a group of people, especially for religious reasons: The markings and designs have totemic significance. The car industry has a totemic status that is out of proportion to its real economic significance. See
totem
More examplesFewer examplesAncient totemic drawings often showed an animal's head on a human body.The lizard symbol had totemic significance in at least seven Aboriginal regions.They were totemic figures for a generation of reporters who went to the world's most dangerous places.
